t: Great American Beers: Twelve Brands That Became Icons: Yenne, Bill: 9780760317891: Amazon.com: Books
s: Beer writer Bill Yenne tells the story of twelve iconic brands of beer that were once either regionally or nationally dominant. These include Acme, Ballantine, Falstaff, Hamm’s, Lone Star, Lucky Lager, Miller High Life, Olympia, Pabst Blue Ribbon, Rainer, Rheingold, and Schlitz.

t: Our Beer Options – Old Nation Brewing Co.
s: Boreal means “of the north” and as Michigan lifers, we are always happy to help represent the north to the nation when it comes to unique and drinkable beer, like our Boreal Dry Hopped Lager.

t: National Premium Beer
s: For the first time since 1996, National Premium is being brewed in Baltimore! The liquid behind the iconic brand will now be contract brewed by Heavy Seas at their Halethorpe Brewery for the National Brewing Company. ... As the name states, National Premium was an upscale beer.

t: Amazon.com: Beer: Amazon Fresh
Beer - Walmart.com
s: Lager: Lager is a type of beer that is brewed with a cool fermentation process, resulting in a smooth, crisp taste. Lagers are typically brewed with bottom-fermenting yeast at a temperature between 45-55 degrees F and are often light in color and low in alcohol content.

t: Beer brands ranked 2024 | Statista
s: With 88 and 87 percent brand awareness respectively, Bud Light and Corona Extra are the most well-known beer brands in the United States. The third spot on this list is shared between Budweiser and Heineken, as both are recognized by 86 percent of surveyed consumers.

t: Old Nation Brewing | Artisan Beverage Group
s: January 5, 2023 - At Old Nation, we take pride in old school brewing philosophies that may not look sexy on paper but make great beer. With the lessons those old philosophies bring comes perspective. Good brewing perspective is how we know to keep the things that work and change the things that don’t, here.

t: Here Are the Most Popular Beers in America by State, According to a New Report
s: What beers are Americans looking up the most? A recent study examined Google Trends and YouGov data to determine the top-searched brews in each state. While Miller took the top spot in 30 states, regional standouts like Guinness, Heineken, and Coors prove that local preferences still matter.

t: National Brewing Company - Wikipedia
s: January 6, 2025 - The National Brewing Company brands continued to be brewed at the Halethorpe plant until it closed in 1996. Since 2000, the company’s two most prominent brands, National Bohemian Beer and Colt 45, have been brewed for Pabst Brewing Company at several plants.
